org.xerial.snappy
Interface SnappyNativeAPI

All Known Implementing Classes:
SnappyNative
public interface SnappyNativeAPI

Internal only - Do not use this class. Interface to access the native code of Snappy. Although this class members are public, do not use them directly. Use Snappy API instead.

Author:
leo
